storyInfo: The pole-carrier has his longed-for duel with the innkeeper to break free of his past, but is caught off-guard as more and more hands enter the fray. Amidst the melee, the goblet is knocked off a cliff, and with no other option, Lee must be the first to search for it.

attributes.content: My head, poor head... what makes this clamor now... hm?
Ah... it was a folk song of bamboo, clapping away.
He shelves his game, knows not of ages' change. From dreams I wake, ask only of the years... what years... what years...
Urgh...
Why is my wine gone?
What cruelty is this.
Shang Zhong feels at the herbal plaster on his neck, as is his habit.
His ten years taking up his pole every day, climbing up and down the mountain, was his habit too.
Qujiang Peak is incontestably tall and perilous. So tall it lacks any human habitation, so perilous not a sound can be heard.
He's lost count of how many springtimes he's now passed in Shangshu. He raises his head to look afar, and at the end of a pass with no human's former trace, he sees but one person.
A person who has been waiting for him, for a very long time.
...In the end, we meet again.
attributes.name: Pole-Carrier

attributes.content: We only just met.
attributes.name: Innkeeper Zheng

attributes.content: You didn't have your blade then, so we didn't meet.
attributes.name: Pole-Carrier

attributes.content: Well, I've brought it now.
attributes.name: Innkeeper Zheng

attributes.content: I'll be clear.
attributes.name: Pole-Carrier

attributes.content: I know the fault isn't yours. I also know, that rainy night, it wasn't just my son who died.
attributes.name: Pole-Carrier

attributes.content: Of course you know.
attributes.name: Innkeeper Zheng

attributes.content: You took in his daughter. How is she now?
attributes.name: Pole-Carrier

attributes.content: I plan for her to continue my work.
attributes.name: Innkeeper Zheng

attributes.content: Your work as an escort? Or do you want her comfortable as an innkeeper, like you've been these past years?
attributes.name: Pole-Carrier

attributes.content: Either or. Whatever she likes.
attributes.name: Innkeeper Zheng

attributes.content: Has she found a sweetheart?
attributes.name: Pole-Carrier

attributes.content: Not yet.
attributes.name: Innkeeper Zheng

attributes.content: A shame.
attributes.name: Pole-Carrier

attributes.content: You won't live to see the day she becomes a bride.
attributes.name: Pole-Carrier

attributes.content: Maybe we don't need to jump to the killing today?
attributes.name: Innkeeper Zheng

attributes.content: Impossible. I know how you are. Your heart is heavy, but mine holds a grudge.
attributes.name: Pole-Carrier

attributes.content: A grudge of ten years.
attributes.name: Pole-Carrier

attributes.content: So you never planned to win against me today. The restaurants, teahouses, inns, aren't they all ways out to leave to your daughter?
attributes.name: Pole-Carrier

attributes.content: You know the escort is a profession of wrongs. You also know the state the escorts will be in, with you gone.
attributes.name: Pole-Carrier

attributes.content: Don't forget. You've gone outside the rules, with a blade strapped to you. People will sympathize with you. But by reason, you'll still be a traitor.
attributes.name: Innkeeper Zheng

attributes.content: If you bore the guilt and led the escorts onward after that night, how could I be betraying it?!
attributes.name: Pole-Carrier

attributes.content: My son walked that path. How could I not know? But your actions, opening inns and restaurants? Aren't you trampling upon their deaths?
attributes.name: Pole-Carrier

attributes.content: It was you! You fell at a stroke, and ran from your past!
attributes.name: Pole-Carrier

attributes.content: I did... I know that. But we've said a little more than enough now.
attributes.name: Innkeeper Zheng

attributes.content: I am Head of the Xingyu Escort Assocation, Asker to the Frost, Zheng Qingyue.
attributes.name: Innkeeper Zheng

attributes.content: ...Polearm of the Shangs, Shang Zhong.
attributes.name: Pole-Carrier

attributes.content: In early spring, twilight approaches. The trees' shadows sway, the fallen snow like silver.
A gust of wind blows, and a blade falls.
You've rested far too long, Zheng Qingyue.
attributes.name: Pole-Carrier

attributes.content: It might not be my rest. Maybe you've climbed too many mountains, improved your footwork again.
attributes.name: Innkeeper Zheng

attributes.content: It's hard to know.
attributes.name: Pole-Carrier

attributes.content: But heroes like you are doomed to spend your older years unable to walk. It's such a shame.
attributes.name: Innkeeper Zheng

attributes.content: So your blade flowed quick, the snow's gleam hit my eyes, you cut open my trouser leg, and you think now I can't walk?
attributes.name: Pole-Carrier

attributes.content: You won't be able to block the next slash. That pole isn't any family treasure, you know. It's nothing but a stick of lousy bamboo.
attributes.name: Innkeeper Zheng

attributes.content: —Dad!
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: Ye?! What are you...
attributes.name: Innkeeper Zheng

attributes.content: So you were Du Yaoye after all. In the blink of an eye, you've grown so tall...
attributes.name: Pole-Carrier

attributes.content: Oh.
attributes.name: Pole-Carrier

attributes.content: You two are quite free, if it's getting dark and you still have the time to be... practicing kung fu here.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: It's you. What are you doing here?
attributes.name: Pole-Carrier

attributes.content: I'll tell you straight, Master Shang. My friend tasked me to find that goblet on your belt. I'm looking for a pavilion, and I just can't do without that cup.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: I worry, see, since swords don't discriminate. If you... glanced off of it in your scuffle, it'd hardly be worth it when the dust settles.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Dad, what are you even doing—!
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: Ten years ago, the Xingyu Escort Association took on a great commission. But heavy rains came on the way, and they were attacked by bandits in the wild.
attributes.name: Pole-Carrier

attributes.content: To protect the goods, Zheng Qingyue abandoned his fellow escorts. A dozen brothers were killed. Among them was my son, and your... blood father.
attributes.name: Pole-Carrier

attributes.content: Zheng Qingyue let them die without trying. Not only did he let them die, he didn't protect the goods in the end. He didn't protect the escorts' reputation.
attributes.name: Pole-Carrier

attributes.content: I—
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: And after all that, he even turned a blind eye to their decline, and fled from his failure. Did you know that?
attributes.name: Pole-Carrier

attributes.content: After that, your mother left Shangshu, and went back to her home.
attributes.name: Pole-Carrier

attributes.content: Du Yaoye... Can you swear you knew any of this?
attributes.name: Pole-Carrier

attributes.content: Ye. This has nothing to do with you. Your dad's going to—
attributes.name: Innkeeper Zheng

attributes.content: Then you're... Master Shang.
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: No.
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: The traitor Shang Zhong.
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: Who the hell do you think I am? You think I spent all my life sheltered like some clueless idiot?
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: Yeah, I knew all about my mom and dad. I know better than you what old Zheng's done all these years and how he's done it.
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: And that's precisely why I need to tell you two today—
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: —Association this and inn that, they'll all be Du's sooner or later.
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: Now, if you two oldies can stop making trouble for me.
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: If you don't step aside, you'll regret it.
attributes.name: Pole-Carrier

attributes.content: If you've got something to say, say it...
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: A coin-sword?
attributes.name: Pole-Carrier

attributes.content: You're joking. Are you going to cast some kind of magic in front of me or something?
attributes.name: Pole-Carrier

attributes.content: Ah, excuse me, now, I'm not handy in close combat at all... it's just...
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: If you really want this thing, then take it. Catch.
attributes.name: Pole-Carrier

attributes.content: ––Hold it!
attributes.name: Innkeeper Zheng

attributes.content: Zheng Qingyue! No more distractions!
attributes.name: Pole-Carrier

attributes.content: —Don't touch my dad!
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: Rngh! Out of the way!
attributes.name: Pole-Carrier

attributes.content: Urgh!
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: Ye!
attributes.name: Innkeeper Zheng

attributes.content: Shang Zhong, you've lost it! Using violence on the young!
attributes.name: Innkeeper Zheng

attributes.content: A clang.
A sweep of the pole holds back the sharp gleam, but without obstruction, Zheng Qingyue's blade now sweeps elsewhere.
And that goblet proves its sturdiness again, for how could earthenware anywhere take a strike from Zheng Qingyue's blade without a stroke of harm?
But with that strike, that goblet, black as the night, is sent flying away.
—The cup!
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Just leave us! Go do your thing!
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: But you're...
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: This is family business!
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: Fine.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Just hold on for a bit, I'll be right there.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Ye, don't let him go!
attributes.name: Innkeeper Zheng

attributes.content: This stupid old man wants your life and you're still obsessed with that lousy thing!
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: Du Yaoye is right. Ten years ago, you lost this goblet on a mountain ridge. Now, you've lost it again. How does it feel?
attributes.name: Pole-Carrier

attributes.content: Shang Zhong...!
attributes.name: Innkeeper Zheng

attributes.content: If you want me aside, the answer's simple.
attributes.name: Pole-Carrier

attributes.content: Tch.
attributes.name: Innkeeper Zheng

attributes.content: This is far enough!
attributes.name: Taihe

attributes.content: Mr. Zheng!
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: —The goblet's been knocked down the cliff. That Lungmenite's already after it. Move it, both of you!
attributes.name: Innkeeper Zheng

attributes.content: Thank you, sir.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Taihe.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Understood.
attributes.name: Taihe

attributes.content: —Cheh.
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: Miss Du, what's your business here?
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: I'm not letting you go.
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: Why not?
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: There's been Mr. Liang and that Lee man and both of you impossible-looking mandarins, and—
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: After all my bystanding, I've finally gotten things straight.
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: Besides, I made an agreement with Lee. We value our promises, and that's how it works.
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: Ye! Enough troublemaking!
attributes.name: Innkeeper Zheng

attributes.content: ...What a gaggle.
attributes.name: Pole-Carrier

attributes.content: There shouldn't have been this many people today. But no matter...
attributes.name: Pole-Carrier

attributes.content: Having you is enough to settle things.
attributes.name: Pole-Carrier

attributes.content: —Tch!
attributes.name: Innkeeper Zheng

attributes.content: Miss Du, you should know we handle affairs impartially.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: I don't think you're all that 'impartial.'
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: Please, step aside.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: No.
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: Then you'll have to excuse me!
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Now, now, don't be hasty! It won't do for a great lord like you to be meting out such force on a young girl, will it?
attributes.name: Mr. Nothing

attributes.content: —The Yin-ch'ing Fan of the Liens. As fine a kung fu as expected.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Ingrate.
attributes.name: Taihe

attributes.content: Lord Zuo, are you alright?
attributes.name: Taihe

attributes.content: I'm fine.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Ugh! Ow-ow-ow... It's truly fearsome you should throw such vast bricks with ease.
attributes.name: Mr. Nothing

attributes.content: You had your chance. No excuses.
attributes.name: Taihe

attributes.content: Crossbow bolts! Who was that?
attributes.name: Innkeeper Zheng

attributes.content: Here I am. You're looking the wrong way.
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: You're...
attributes.name: Innkeeper Zheng

attributes.content: Don't get in the way, rabbit.
attributes.name: Pole-Carrier

attributes.content: So Rhodes Island doesn't intend on assisting the Sui Regulator?
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: We don't.
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: Maybe your compass points the same way as ours, but Nian and us have gotten on for a long while. I know her character in and out.
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: A beast's heart is hardly fathomed. What can her character be worth?
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Maybe not much else, for all I know. But at the very least, it's worth me.
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: And me. Dusk tore my confusion with a stroke, and gave me what I'll describe as a blunt awakening... I might like to stand to the side of things, but the occasion's fine, and I know to pay a grace back.
attributes.name: Mr. Nothing

attributes.content: The Lien clan's Yin-ch'ing Fan.
attributes.name: Taihe

attributes.content: You gave me a good scare last time, rooted me straight to the spot. Much thanks for the opportunity now, yes, much thanks.
attributes.name: Mr. Nothing

attributes.content: Hmm...
attributes.name: Taihe

attributes.content: If you want to fight over your cup, get lost before you do.
attributes.name: Pole-Carrier

attributes.content: This goblet has huge significance to the Association. If I could just leave it like that, I may as well be dead, you understand?
attributes.name: Innkeeper Zheng

attributes.content: You may as well be dead right now.
attributes.name: Pole-Carrier

attributes.content: Good, good, good. That's the look of Zheng Qingyue. Is it because your daughter's here, or because of your escort prestige?
attributes.name: Pole-Carrier

attributes.content: You always were someone who wanted to live on. Now our battle finally has meaning.
attributes.name: Pole-Carrier

attributes.content: Shang Zhong.
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: If your son in spirit knew what you were doing today, would he be happy?
attributes.name: Miss Du

attributes.content: Don't you throw that concept at me. Even if he was alive here and now, he wouldn't be able to hold back his father!
attributes.name: Pole-Carrier

attributes.content: Master Shen, why are you here?
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: I sent those few people to the top, and came back down. I thought I'd run into you eventually, Mr. Liang.
attributes.name: Boatman

attributes.content: So you're making your way too?
attributes.name: Boatman

attributes.content: It's been a while since I came. I'm taking a look around the vicinity.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: How about Miss Ning?
attributes.name: Boatman

attributes.content: She's aware, or perhaps was long since aware.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: The theft in the study was her own devising, likely.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: You'd better try and appease her, sir, please.
attributes.name: Boatman

attributes.content: Forget all the others, you can't ever let that old Bai potter wade into the fight.
attributes.name: Boatman

attributes.content: Tianshi Bai...
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: If he calls a strike of lightning down, he'll have blasted straight over the Sui Regulator and the Ministry of Rites. We don't know where the Tianshi stand on this.
attributes.name: Boatman

attributes.content: I thank you for your concern, Master Shen.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: *Sigh*... I'm only a boatman, for all my concern is.
attributes.name: Boatman

attributes.content: I guarded the north for a few years. I chatted with the other soldiers, talking home and the times and so on, throughout all the cold days with nothing to do.
attributes.name: Boatman

attributes.content: We all devoted out hearts to Yan, but a little foolishness here and there hardly needed to get away from us.
attributes.name: Boatman

attributes.content: Such is the prudence of the ordinary man.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: That's what I am. Aren't you too, Mr. Liang?
attributes.name: Boatman

attributes.content: The land is vast and wide, all things free. Under heaven's infinity, all are ordinary men.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: *Sigh*... What do you hope for me to do?
attributes.name: Boatman

attributes.content: I hope you'll protect the peace and safety of Shangshu, Master Shen. If any setbacks should happen in the end... I hope you'll leap in to pacify the dispute, before Miss Ning and the other five act.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: There's the old saying. Ultimately, human affairs all depend on heaven's mandate.
attributes.name: Boatman

attributes.content: A shame.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: This is the first adage I learned from Yan's court: 'Heaven's mandate lies in man.'
attributes.name: Liang Xun
